item.title: CVE-2020-1707|2024-08-04T06:46:30.234Z -- %5Bunknown%5D -- openshift%2Fpostgresql-apb
item.description: A vulnerability was found in all openshift/postgresql-apb 4.x.x versions prior to 4.3.0, where an insecure modification vulnerability in the /etc/passwd file was found in the container openshift/postgresql-apb. An attacker with access to the container could use this flaw to modify /etc/passwd and escalate their privileges.
